title: Can't join the club I created

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by DawnSavior. f

body:
After the problems with clubs like a month ago, yesterday I went to the Clubs tab, and the club I had made was gone. I got on my other account to see if it was still active, and it was. My main account was still the owner, and was in the club; on my main account, since I had no active clubs, I was able to make another club, despite still being the owner of one. Also I can't invite myself to the club on my other account since I'm still the owner of it on my main account. 

So I would like to know if there was any way to "rejoin" my club, even though I'm the owner.

replies.body: Everything looks okay now with your specific case.  Let me know if the problem still exists!
At least I'm not the only one
Same issue, i noticed i don't have my tag anymore, dicided to it check out, and find out i'm not joined to any clubs, but from my friends accuouts it looks like i still in charge of club...
I'm having the same exact problem.
